00028 template< typename MODULE, unsigned int BUSWIDTH, typename TYPES
00029         , sc_core::sc_port_policy POL = sc_core::SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND >
00030 class simple_initiator_socket_b
00031   : public tlm::tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES, 1, POL>
00032   , protected simple_socket_base
00033 {
00034 public:
00035   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_payload_type                transaction_type;
00036   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_phase_type                  phase_type;
00037   typedef tlm::tlm_sync_enum                              sync_enum_type;
00038   typedef tlm::tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>                 fw_interface_type;
00039   typedef tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>                 bw_interface_type;
00040   typedef tlm::tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH,TYPES,1,POL> base_type;
00041 
00042 public:
00043   static const char* default_name()
00044     { return sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("simple_initiator_socket"); }
00045 
00046   explicit simple_initiator_socket_b(const char* n = default_name())
00047     : base_type(n)
00048     , m_process(this)
00049   {
00050     this->m_export.bind(m_process);
00051   }
00052 
00053   void register_nb_transport_bw(MODULE* mod,
00054                                 sync_enum_type (MODULE::*cb)(transaction_type&,
00055                                                              phase_type&,
00056                                                              sc_core::sc_time&))
00057   {
00058     m_process.set_transport_ptr(mod, cb);
00059   }
00060 
00061   void register_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(MODULE* mod,
00062                                           void (MODULE::*cb)(sc_dt::uint64, sc_dt::uint64))
00063   {
00064     m_process.set_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(mod, cb);
00065   }
00066 
00067 private:
00068   class process
00069     : public tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>
00070     , protected convenience_socket_cb_holder
00071   {
00072   public:
00073     typedef sync_enum_type (MODULE::*TransportPtr)(transaction_type&,
00074                                                    phase_type&,
00075                                                    sc_core::sc_time&);
00076     typedef void (MODULE::*InvalidateDirectMemPtr)(sc_dt::uint64,
00077                                                    sc_dt::uint64);
00078 
00079     explicit process(simple_socket_base* owner)
00080       : convenience_socket_cb_holder(owner), m_mod(0)
00081       , m_transport_ptr(0)
00082       , m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(0)
00083     {
00084     }
00085 
00086     void set_transport_ptr(MODULE* mod, TransportPtr p)
00087     {
00088       if (m_transport_ptr) {
00089         display_warning("non-blocking callback already registered");
00090         return;
00091       }
00092       sc_assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00093       m_mod = mod;
00094       m_transport_ptr = p;
00095     }
00096 
00097     void set_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(MODULE* mod, InvalidateDirectMemPtr p)
00098     {
00099       if (m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr) {
00100         display_warning("invalidate DMI callback already registered");
00101         return;
00102       }
00103       sc_assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00104       m_mod = mod;
00105       m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr = p;
00106     }
00107 
00108     sync_enum_type nb_transport_bw(transaction_type& trans, phase_type& phase, sc_core::sc_time& t)
00109     {
00110       if (m_transport_ptr) {
00111         // forward call
00112         sc_assert(m_mod);
00113         return (m_mod->*m_transport_ptr)(trans, phase, t);
00114       }
00115       display_error("no transport callback registered");
00116       return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;
00117     }
00118 
00119     void invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(sc_dt::uint64 start_range,
00120                                    sc_dt::uint64 end_range)
00121     {
00122       if (m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr) {
00123         // forward call
00124         sc_assert(m_mod);
00125         (m_mod->*m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr)(start_range, end_range);
00126       }
00127     }
00128 
00129   private:
00130     MODULE* m_mod;
00131     TransportPtr m_transport_ptr;
00132     InvalidateDirectMemPtr m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr;
00133   };
00134 
00135 private:
00136   const sc_core::sc_object* get_socket() const { return this; }
00137 private:
00138   process m_process;
00139 };
00140 
00141 template< typename MODULE, unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32
00142         , typename TYPES = tlm::tlm_base_protocol_types >
00143 class simple_initiator_socket
00144   : public simple_initiator_socket_b<MODULE,BUSWIDTH,TYPES>
00145 {
00146   typedef simple_initiator_socket_b<MODULE,BUSWIDTH,TYPES> socket_b;
00147 public:
00148   simple_initiator_socket() : socket_b() {}
00149   explicit simple_initiator_socket(const char* name) : socket_b(name) {}
00150 };

00154 class simple_initiator_socket_optional
00155   : public simple_initiator_socket_b<MODULE,BUSWIDTH,TYPES,sc_core::SC_ZERO_OR_MORE_BOUND>

00166 template< typename MODULE, unsigned int BUSWIDTH, typename TYPES
00167         , sc_core::sc_port_policy POL = sc_core::SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND >
00168 class simple_initiator_socket_tagged_b
00169   : public tlm::tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES, 1, POL>
00170   , protected simple_socket_base
00171 {
00172 public:
00173   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_payload_type                transaction_type;
00174   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_phase_type                  phase_type;
00175   typedef tlm::tlm_sync_enum                              sync_enum_type;
00176   typedef tlm::tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>                 fw_interface_type;
00177   typedef tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>                 bw_interface_type;
00178   typedef tlm::tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH,TYPES,1,POL> base_type;
00179 
00180 public:
00181   static const char* default_name()
00182     { return sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("simple_initiator_socket_tagged"); }
00183 
00184   explicit simple_initiator_socket_tagged_b(const char* n = default_name())
00185     : base_type(n)
00186     , m_process(this)
00187   {
00188     this->m_export.bind(m_process);
00189   }
00190 
00191   void register_nb_transport_bw(MODULE* mod,
00192                                 sync_enum_type (MODULE::*cb)(int,
00193                                                              transaction_type&,
00194                                                              phase_type&,
00195                                                              sc_core::sc_time&),
00196                                 int id)
00197   {
00198     m_process.set_transport_ptr(mod, cb);
00199     m_process.set_transport_user_id(id);
00200   }
00201 
00202   void register_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(MODULE* mod,
00203                                           void (MODULE::*cb)(int, sc_dt::uint64, sc_dt::uint64),
00204                                            int id)
00205   {
00206     m_process.set_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(mod, cb);
00207     m_process.set_invalidate_dmi_user_id(id);
00208   }
00209 
00210 private:
00211   class process
00212     : public tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>
00213     , protected convenience_socket_cb_holder
00214   {
00215   public:
00216     typedef sync_enum_type (MODULE::*TransportPtr)(int,
00217                                                    transaction_type&,
00218                                                    phase_type&,
00219                                                    sc_core::sc_time&);
00220     typedef void (MODULE::*InvalidateDirectMemPtr)(int,
00221                                                    sc_dt::uint64,
00222                                                    sc_dt::uint64);
00223 
00224     explicit process(simple_socket_base* owner)
00225       : convenience_socket_cb_holder(owner), m_mod(0)
00226       , m_transport_ptr(0)
00227       , m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(0)
00228       , m_transport_user_id(0)
00229       , m_invalidate_direct_mem_user_id(0)
00230     {
00231     }
00232 
00233     void set_transport_user_id(int id) { m_transport_user_id = id; }
00234     void set_invalidate_dmi_user_id(int id) { m_invalidate_direct_mem_user_id = id; }
00235 
00236     void set_transport_ptr(MODULE* mod, TransportPtr p)
00237     {
00238       if (m_transport_ptr) {
00239         display_warning("non-blocking callback already registered");
00240         return;
00241       }
00242       sc_assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00243       m_mod = mod;
00244       m_transport_ptr = p;
00245     }
00246 
00247     void set_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(MODULE* mod, InvalidateDirectMemPtr p)
00248     {
00249       if (m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr) {
00250         display_warning("invalidate DMI callback already registered");
00251         return;
00252       }
00253       sc_assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00254       m_mod = mod;
00255       m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr = p;
00256     }
00257 
00258     sync_enum_type nb_transport_bw(transaction_type& trans, phase_type& phase, sc_core::sc_time& t)
00259     {
00260       if (m_transport_ptr) {
00261         // forward call
00262         sc_assert(m_mod);
00263         return (m_mod->*m_transport_ptr)(m_transport_user_id, trans, phase, t);
00264       }
00265       display_error("no transport callback registered");
00266       return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;
00267     }
00268 
00269     void invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(sc_dt::uint64 start_range,
00270                                    sc_dt::uint64 end_range)
00271     {
00272       if (m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr) {
00273         // forward call
00274         sc_assert(m_mod);
00275         (m_mod->*m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr)(m_invalidate_direct_mem_user_id, start_range, end_range);
00276       }
00277     }
00278 
00279   private:
00280     MODULE* m_mod;
00281     TransportPtr m_transport_ptr;
00282     InvalidateDirectMemPtr m_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr;
00283     int m_transport_user_id;
00284     int m_invalidate_direct_mem_user_id;
00285   };

00290   process m_process;
